scripts.install-all: concurrently "npm --prefix quizza-frontend run start" "npm --prefix quizza-backend run start:dev"
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm --prefix quizza-frontend run start" "npm --prefix quizza-backend run start:dev"
scripts.package: npm --prefix quizza-frontend run build && npm --prefix quizza-backend run build && npx pkg quizza-backend/dist/main.js
